text.section:
Sec. 33E-3. Intent and purposes.
This chapter is intended to implement and be consistent with the Miami-Dade County Comprehensive Development Master Plan adopted pursuant to Chapter 163, Florida Statutes.
The purpose of this chapter in regulating development is to ensure that all new development bears its proportionate share of a portion of the capital cost of roadway capacity improvements necessary to allow an adequate level of roadway service.
